title: Update to v2.9.0
description: Customizable wallpapers, shared folders and more
changelog:
Colorgram was updated to version 2.9.0. What's new?
• Hide Channel Bottom Button
• Optional Quick Reactions
• New Camera Section: Disable/Enable Camera and Camera Preview in attachments
• Show Icon to Manage Items on Sidebar
• Smooth Navigation: Smooth transitions among app sections
• View Accounts Registration date
• Bug fixes and other improvements
